meanings.sent1: After the game, the players decided to reteam for the next match.
meanings.sent2: The friends decided to reteam for the school project.
meanings.sent3: The superheroes had to reteam to save the city from the villain's evil plan.
meanings.sent4: The students had to reteam their efforts to complete the group project on time.
meanings.sent5: The band members were excited to reteam for the upcoming concert.

meanings.definition: To join or be joined in a team again.
meanings.sent1: The experienced players were happy to reteam with the new recruits.
meanings.sent2: The siblings decided to reteam for the family game night.
meanings.sent3: The detectives had to reteam to solve the mysterious case.
meanings.sent4: The robots reteamed to defeat the alien invaders.
meanings.sent5: The athletes reteamed for the championship match.
